price: 138. Annonce aux hypocrites qu’il y aura pour eux un très douloureux supplice,
arabic: بَشِّرِ ٱلۡمُنَٰفِقِينَ بِأَنَّ لَهُمۡ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: bashiri al-munāfiqīna bi-anna lahum ʿadhāban alīman
